name: gti_agent
description: An agent for Threat Intelligence operations using Google Threat Intelligence.

skills.name: Threat Intelligence
skills.description: Provides threat intelligence from the Google Threat Intelligence platform. It can search for and retrieve information about threat actors, malware, campaigns, vulnerabilities, and reports.
examples: Search for reports on the latest ransomware trends.
Get a report on the threat actor known as 'APT28'.
What are the latest threats targeting the financial industry?

skills.name: IOC Analysis
skills.description: Analyzes Indicators of Compromise (IOCs) such as files, domains, IP addresses, and URLs. It provides detailed reports and relationships to other entities.
examples: Get a report on the domain 'example.com'.
What are the resolutions for the IP address '8.8.8.8'?

skills.name: Collection Management
skills.description: Manages collections of IOCs. It can create, update, and modify collections of threat intelligence.
examples: Create a new collection of IOCs related to the 'SolarWinds' campaign.
Add the domain 'evil.com' to the collection 'My Malware'.
Update the description of the collection 'My Malware'.

skills.name: Threat Hunting
skills.description: Hunts for threats using Digital Threat Monitoring (DTM) and YARA rules. It can search for documents and examine hunting rulesets.
examples: Search for documents in DTM related to 'my-company.com'.
Get the YARA rules for the ruleset 'my_rules'.

skills.name: Threat Profiles
skills.description: Manages personalized Threat Profiles. It can list, view, and get recommendations from threat profiles to focus on relevant threats.
examples: What are the latest threats targeting the financial industry?
Get the recommendations for the threat profile 'my_profile'.
